mapper.select: select WHCD_XL,COUNT(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."GPSSYDWGZRYJBQKHMC" GROUP BY WHCD_XL order by COUNT(*) desc
select WHCD_BYYX,COUNT(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."GPSSYDWGZRYJBQKHMC" GROUP BY WHCD_BYYX order by COUNT(*) desc
select XB,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."GPSSYDWGZRYJBQKHMC" group by XB
select wm_concat(SL_TYPE) as type from "GP_SZZF_Q"."XXJBXXB" group by SL_TYPE

select JYJDCZGZZZ as name,sum(cast(ZXSS as int)) as total,sum(cast(ZXSS_N as int)) as nv from "GP_SZZF_Q"."XSFNJZXXSQKJBXX" where ND = #{date} group by JYJDCZGZZZ union select '小学' as name,sum(cast(ZXSS as int)) as total,sum(cast(ZXSS_N as int)) as nv from "GP_SZZF_Q"."XSFNJZXXSQKJBXXXX" where ND = #{date} union select '幼儿园' as name,sum(cast(ZYRS as int)) as total,sum(cast(ZYRS_N as int)) as nv from "GP_SZZF_Q"."XSFNJZXXSQKJBXXYRY" where ND = #{date}

select '5岁及以下' as name,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."ZXXSJBXXHZ" where SFZH is not null and YEAR(CURDATE())-CAST(SUBSTR(SFZH,7,4) AS INT) <= 5 union all select '6-7岁' as name,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."ZXXSJBXXHZ" where SFZH is not null and YEAR(CURDATE())-CAST(SUBSTR(SFZH,7,4) AS INT) >= 6 and YEAR(CURDATE())-CAST(SUBSTR(SFZH,7,4) AS INT) < 7 union all select '7-8岁' as name,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."ZXXSJBXXHZ" where SFZH is not null and YEAR(CURDATE())-CAST(SUBSTR(SFZH,7,4) AS INT) >= 7 and YEAR(CURDATE())-CAST(SUBSTR(SFZH,7,4) AS INT) < 8 union all select '8-9岁' as name,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."ZXXSJBXXHZ" where SFZH is not null and YEAR(CURDATE())-CAST(SUBSTR(SFZH,7,4) AS INT) >= 8 and YEAR(CURDATE())-CAST(SUBSTR(SFZH,7,4) AS INT) <= 9 union all select '10-11岁' as name,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."ZXXSJBXXHZ" where SFZH is not null and YEAR(CURDATE())-CAST(SUBSTR(SFZH,7,4) AS INT) >= 10 and YEAR(CURDATE())-CAST(SUBSTR(SFZH,7,4) AS INT) <= 11 union all select '12岁及以上' as name,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."ZXXSJBXXHZ" where SFZH is not null and YEAR(CURDATE())-CAST(SUBSTR(SFZH,7,4) AS INT) >= 12
